title: Dŗg-Dŗśya-Viveka: An inquiry into the Nature of the 'Seer' and the 'Seen'
description: This title is known as a prakarana treatise of Vedanta philosophy. The special feature of this book is the detailed description of the various kinds of samadhi. Devanagri text with English translation and notes.
author: Nikhilananda
